about_subtitle: Product guy, SQL Ninja, competent programmer
about_text: I am industrial engineer working in software development with over 3 years of experience. My passion is combining design, data and technology to develop amazing products and experiences for users.
omio_description: Product ownership and full-stack development of company's internal CRM and additional tooling.
bls_1_description: Product management and data analysis for major European ground transport (bus, rail, ridesharing) search engine, with 11 web domains and Android / iOS mobile apps.
hiwi_description: Development of data gathering MS Excel extension and support of research projects.
kit_description: Main focus: Statistics and Logistics; Thesis: Design and Evaluation of a Human-Robot-Collaboration Concept for the Montage of Battery Modules
